mapper.select: select rsc_code , FN_GET_CODE_NAME(rsc_code) AS rscName , rsc_flag from resources ORDER BY rsc_code
select rsc_lot , store_no , ist_cnt , store_etc from resource_store where rsc_code = #{rscCode} AND ist_flag = 'Y'
select * from Employee_info where dept_code = 'D002' AND position_code = 'W003'
select * from common_code where group_code = 'cus' AND code_desct = '구매처'
select to_number(to_char(store_date , 'MM'))+1 pmonth from resource_store where rsc_code =#{rscCode} group by to_number(to_char(store_date , 'MM'))+1
mapper.insert: insert into resources ( rsc_code, rsc_unit, rsc_prc, rsc_man_code, suplcom_code, rsc_flag ) values ( #{rscCode}, #{rscUnit}, #{rscPrc}, #{rscManCode}, #{suplcomCode}, 'N' )
